storyInfo: In the present day, Sesa and Heavyrain meet a mysterious guest while on assignment in Sargon, and the whole affair is not without ties to a struggle in the Ibut region over twenty years ago.

attributes.content: Modern Day
2:48 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, Nameless Town
No-one here. (We still haven't seen a trace of them. Did they get caught up in something...?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Strange. This is exactly where we agreed to meet up, right?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Our coordinates check out.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: We can't rule out a sandstorm. Let's stay calm.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Sesa... this isn't good.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hey, now. They're not here yet, but what good is it being so grim? Are we just going to have a staring contest?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Now's not the time for video games, though. Why did you bring that along?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Not importantâ€”
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Something must be wrong. We should've at least gotten contact at a set time.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Shouldn't we do something or other?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Don't worry so much. What can we even do? The best plan is to just sit tight here, and wait for an answer.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: But... it's been too long.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hold on, there'sâ€”
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Good morning.
Heavyrain! Cool it!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Hmphâ€”
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Sâ€”Sorry, I struck on reflex...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Oh, your looks deceive. You're quite the quick-tempered girl. This will only damage your first impressions, though...
(Sargonian) This is the Reefsteep Black Market, and we're all in business here. I trust we have words for each other, so no need for an armed conversation, yes?
(Sargonian) What day is today? Why would the 'Sand Soldier' be here?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Oh, you recognize me?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: (Sargonian) The head intel peddler of the Reefsteep market, the puppeteer of the vast majority of all armed conflicts in Ibut, styled by the locals as 'Zuzu.'
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: (Sargonian) In ancient tongue, it entailed a charm, or perhaps a talismanâ€”
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: (Sargonian) â€”but I know what lies behind your new name, 'Sand Soldier.' What's a major player like you up to here?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Let's not get ahead of ourselves, I just wanted to have a chat with you two. With... er, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Or perhaps... I've disrupted your original itinerary?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: (Sargonian) ...Where are our Operators?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh... so you're from Sargon too, then. Good. Then let's get right to the point.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Your Operators are safe and sound. Your batch of experimental medical material... also untouched.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Where are they?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Youâ€”
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain, rein it in!
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Quite right. Rein it in. You haven't even the capital to start a conflict with me here.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Compared to how valuable your pharmaceutical materials are, a few porters can't be worth much in my concern...
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: You have your eyes on those materials.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: And if I nodded yes?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Let our Operators go. We'll hand over the goods. How about that?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Oh? As simple as that?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: But all I took was a few employees... now I'm a little skeptical.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Your goods might've had a small footprint, but they're not cheap. It doesn't seem 'Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals' is so profligate a company. Would you really be so willing to give them up?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: I'll stop you right there. Forget market value. Human life is the most precious thing to us.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: A perspective bursting with humanity. But who'll step up to weigh them, thenâ€”decide their worth?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Will a certain 'Kal'tsit?'
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: You nabbed our contract... You know Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No, it's a very common name. Over these years, I've sought so many people in error... so many.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Back to our original topic.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Oh, my apologies. Your people are actually waiting right outside, and I have no interest in your goodsâ€”
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: â€”Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: I'll go check nowâ€”you stay alert.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: As you wish.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Huh! The fixer from the black market... wouldn't come here just to scare our new recruits, would he?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Rhodes Island and the Sargon black market are far from bosom friends. We only had to take this plunge after some of our drugs got jammed up in Columbia.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Oripathy waits for no-one, correct? That's all this is. There should be no conflict between us.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: I've heard of you before, the armaments tuner 'Bridge,' having worked for three different arms dealers in the past. A fine reputation. Oh, I believe you're called 'Sesa' now?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Really, you make too much of me.
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: Well, then, what gives you an interest in Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: During a routine probing of accounts, a completely watertight transaction came to light. You must know, not one sheaf of gold in the Reefsteep passes out of my notice.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: And?
attributes.name: Sesa

attributes.content: No, no cause for worry. You haven't exposed any leverage, and as I've already said, your transaction doesn't interest me. It's just the... signature, on this contract, that I mind.
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.content: Come. I have time to spare today. Tell me, what kind of place is Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals?
attributes.name: 'Sand Soldier'

attributes.text: 'Trek upon Terra, as millions of lives.'

attributes.content: 22 Years Ago
1:09 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, the Town of Redhorn
They're firing! Ambush! Ambush!
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: Withdraw our covâ€”aghhâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: Are they mad?! With this many civilians around?!
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: Quick! Hide here!
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: Shit, close. Thanks.
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: â€”Fire, fire! My houseâ€”ukhâ€” (The sound of a throat being pierced.)
attributes.name: Fleeing Civilian

attributes.content: Hurry! Hurry!!
attributes.name: Fleeing Civilian

attributes.content: Eyaaarghâ€”
attributes.name: Fleeing Civilian

attributes.content: Too many civilians getting caught up...! Are they trying to pull the Lord Ameer of Ibut's whole army in!?
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: The Lord Ameer's army? How do you know they weren't the army in disguise?
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: You meanâ€”
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: Look at this.
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: The red mark...? You picked this off one of the corpsesâ€”?
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: I did. We've been fooled by our own. The situation here is a complete mess now. You might not even get it if I gave you the whole lectureâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: It's way more than just us who wanted to ransack that squad. Dammit. Grab it and turn it into cash, my ass. This is a full-blown war nowâ€”
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: The sentry sent me all the coordinates before going black. There's four different identifiers all crawling this one area!
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: Do you understand what this means? Either we break through the line and earn big, or we still have the chance to surrender right now!
attributes.name: Wounded Mercenary

attributes.content: â€”Goddamnit! This is insane!
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
...should be... alone here...
*cough*...
...whâ€”who?
A child? Why are you carrying a body... eugh, get out of here already!
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: Hold on... your clothes! You're a Columbian!? You're from the 'Sand Soldiers'!
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: B8 here, we have a survivor, a Liberi child, carrying a grown man's bodyâ€”
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: Hey, hold it right there!
attributes.name: Indignant Mercenary

attributes.content: Alright, kids, you all heard that. The 'Sand Soldiers' still have one left alive! We need to bring him over!
attributes.name: Violent Mercenary

attributes.content: There's still a chance our target fell into someone else's hands. Just in case, kill every last one you come across. Doesn't matter if they're the Lord Ameer's. Even if Padishah Murad himself is here, he has to die too.
attributes.name: Violent Mercenary

attributes.content: Remember, a silver box. I want to be sitting on that singing before the sun goes down.
attributes.name: Violent Mercenary

attributes.content: We've intercepted their comms band. It seems the 'Sand Soldiers' still have a survivor.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: A child, carrying a body, probably a comrade. Think he's got what Padishah's after?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Not one team's retreated from that town yet. Chances are they're all still looking for their target.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Of course. Everyone swarming that tiny of a town at once is just going to add to the chaos, waste time and nothing else.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Hold on, our Caster's gotten news. Something's up...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: There's a freight truck... registration Tkaronto, Columbia... parked near the Central Smoke bazaar.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: A woman and a monster? Monster? What monsterâ€”oh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Line cut off. He gets careless too?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: No, his ambush point is at least a kilometer out from the bazaar. It shouldn't have been that fast. Not unless whatever team this is knew the topography here like the backs of their hands... or maybe, they're just experienced enough to blow anyone off the sand.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: Could it be someone from Vouivre? Or some other cutthroat here on Columbia's dime?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary A

attributes.content: Let's watch this unfold first.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary B

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
*cough* *cough*... Why did... Teacher... *cough* *cough*!
Our target's around here! He can't get that far carrying a bodyâ€”
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Tch! We've got trouble! No hesitating! Kill!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: ...am... am I safe...?
...Teacher, Teacher... come on, wake up...
The... I can't stop the blood... you still haven't taught me so much... what do you want me to do...
...Target found.
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't move! One more inch and I'll cut your head off!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Scared stupid, aren't you, talking to a dead guy? Uh-huh?
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Put that idiot on your back down and tell me, where is it!?
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: I don't know...
Mmphâ€”
Don't try and fool me, you worthless... huh?
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Is this... the 'Sand Soldier' leader's body? What are you... wait, do you have it on you?
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: â€”Don't touch him!
Gah! Who do you think you areâ€”piss off!!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Ugh...
The silver combination box! So here it is... heheh, hahahah!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Let go of it! Getâ€”Get out of my way!
Heh, now we've got the target, we don't need to leave any survivors.
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't blame me, kid. This is my jobâ€”
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Whaâ€”What the hell isâ€”?!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Grrr...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: What is thatâ€”hey, is anyone there?! I've run into an unidentiâ€”
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: (Shrieks)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: â€”Ugh!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Machine... no, creature?! What the hell kind of thing are you?!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't get anyâ€”why aren't my bolts doing anythingâ€”don't get any closer! Any closer and I'll kill you!
attributes.name: Searching Mercenary

attributes.content: (Snickers)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Before his eyes, the monster skewers the ruffian.
It lightly unfolds its body, like a stretch in the early morning.
...Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: (Responds)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Ah... ah...
The boy is frozen in place, having long lost the voice to cry out.
He holds only an ice-cold carcass, the blood of the dead clotting on his chest, reminiscent of a flower.
Elliot, you're safe.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Who... who are you... How do you know me?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I know every last esteemed scientist of the Blaine Formative Technologies Research Institute.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: But none of you know what kind of plot this whole affair has been drawn into. I'm here to stop you, and here to protect you.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Protect...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You're already late... too late...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You didn't let your fine teacher's legacy fall into those conspirators' hands. You've done well enough.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: What do you mean, protect...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: â€”You want to protect these! The blueprint, the sample, not me! And not Teacher!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You're just like them! Teacher's dead! All the people who were helping us are dead too! You're all just fighting over this caseâ€”youâ€”youâ€”*cough* *cough*, *cough*â€”
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Adviser, we've confirmed three mercenary teams hired by lords ameer across the map, as well as one Sarkaz unit on a cliff outside the town, affiliation unknown for now.
attributes.name: Comms Voice

attributes.content: According to our plans, we still have seven minutes.
attributes.name: Comms Voice

attributes.content: I've found one survivor, sample in hand.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: The evac route is secure.
attributes.name: Comms Voice

attributes.content: Converge in three minutes.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Tell me, Elliot. The Vouivre soldier you're carrying on your back: what did he die for?
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: ...Shut up...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Right now, you stand here, you live, and you carry what every mercenary here wants.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: The squad operated under the name 'Sand Soldiers'... but in actuality, all that came to Sargon was a research team, and a typical security force from Tkaronto.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Whether or not he persisted in his duty until the end, whether or not he paid mind to your safety until the end, didn't he entrust a deep responsibility to you?
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Whether or not because of your own immature temperament, are you going to make a total waste of all your soldiers' full efforts?
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: I only need an answer.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: As long as I can ensure that this prototype blueprint doesn't fall into any lord ameer's hands, I will not go out of my way to mind anything else. I hope for you to understand this.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: High alert. You still aren't willing to speak much.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: But I remember... the man on your back is Professor Thorne. Blaine Formative Technologies Research Institute, Head Researcher.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: He was not a true soldier. Yet a true soldier is what he is.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Just put him down. Or you could be buried together with him in the yellow dust.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: I trust he believed his death had a purpose, and you should not squander his sacrifice.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: He's already dead.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: No! This isn't your business!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: At least give him a decent burial.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: ...Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: (Hissing)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: What's... What's that ball of light?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Lower your head.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Nghâ€”!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: ...You... You want me to bury Teacher in here?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Professor Thorne is an old friend of mine. The situation is abnormal. We have no chance to more solemnly address his sacrifice.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Every person's life is an endless war.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: On certain motives, his ancestors left Sargon. Wandering again and again, he found a life he could call his own, yet in the end he returned to Sargon's barrens.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: His cause, his just heart, his thirst for knowledge all arrived at their terminus.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: The Professor Thorne I knew was in no way unversed in life's affairs. Candidly, he confronted his own death, and until the very end resisted.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Elliot, just put him down.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: This is respect for the deceased. Surely you understand, he wouldn't have wished to become a burden on your path?
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Okay... okay...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Ancient Vouivran language) May his soul, with the long river, return.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Vouivran...? Areâ€”Are you from Vouivre?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Ancient Vouivran language) May he, as the gravel, pass into eternal tranquility.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: (Ancient Vouivran language) May he ever hear his homeland's whispers. May he, at the other shore, meet the great waves.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: (Ancient Vouivran language) Our friend rests eternal here. He shall return to the boundless cycle of rebirth.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: As the woman bowed her head and prayed, it was as if the fire of war, too, paused for this moment.
...Time is running short. We've paid what respect we can. Now, you must make a choice.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: (A low, alert sounding.)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Correct, they are many, but their formation is in loose disarray. As an armed force, they're not in one heart and mind.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: Before they find us, they'll make their own grave.
attributes.name: Mysterious Woman

attributes.content: ...I remember, now... I remember I saw your face before, somewhere... long ago... Teacher introduced you to me...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I thought you were only a theoretical researcher...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I remember... Your name is...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have quite a good memory, Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.text: The young researcher, Elliot Glover, pays no attention to the mysterious woman as she leaves through the door.
In a daze, he gazes at the soil that half-buried his beloved teacher, the air scattered with dust.
He thinks to himself: I haven't even the strength to cremate my teacher's remains. It leads him, for an instant, to mourn.
Until the sound of warfare resumes once more.
